p: 2’. Body color dark blue to black with patches of yellow on Ant. IV apex, the entire Ant. I, axially on head basis, dorso-external and dorsal-lateral spots on Th. II, dorsal-external spots on Th. III, Abd. II with both an axial spot, and a dorso-external spot extending ventrally, dorso-external small spots on Abd. IV, and dorso-external spots on Abd. V .…………………………………. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Brasilimeria wygodzinskyi (Arlé 1943)
